title: F*ck Love
description: Helena Conway has fallen in love. Unwillingly. Unwittingly.But not unprovoked.Kit Isley is everything she’s not—unstructured, untethered, and not even a little bit careful.It could all be so beautiful … if he wasn’t dating her best friend.Helena must defy her heart, do the right thing, and think of others. Until she doesn’t.
author: Tarryn Fisher
